name: ViaProxy

description: ViaProxy is a standalone proxy which allows players to join EVERY Minecraft server version (Classic, Alpha, Beta, Release, Bedrock)

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# ViaProxy Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Check if VIA_PROXY_VERSION is set
if [ -z "$VIA_PROXY_VERSION" ]; then
    echo "VIA_PROXY_VERSION environment variable is not set."
    exit 1
fi

# Fetch the latest version if VIA_PROXY_VERSION is "latest"
if [ "$VIA_PROXY_VERSION" = "latest" ]; then
    echo "Fetching the latest version..."
    LATEST_RELEASE_URL="https://github.com/ViaVersion/ViaProxy/releases/latest"
    RELEASE_INFO=$(curl -L -s -H "Accept: application/json" "$LATEST_RELEASE_URL")

    # Extract the tag_name which contains the version
    VIA_PROXY_VERSION=$(echo "$RELEASE_INFO" | grep -o '"tag_name": *"[^"]*"' | cut -d '"' -f 4 | sed 's/^v//')

    if [ -z "$VIA_PROXY_VERSION" ]; then
        echo "Failed to fetch the latest version."
        exit 1
    fi
fi

# Construct the download URL
DOWNLOAD_URL="https://github.com/ViaVersion/ViaProxy/releases/download/v${VIA_PROXY_VERSION}/ViaProxy-${VIA_PROXY_VERSION}.jar"

# Download the .jar file
echo "Downloading ViaProxy version $VIA_PROXY_VERSION..."
curl -L -o "$SERVER_JAR" "$DOWNLOAD_URL"

if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "Download complete. The file is saved as $SERVER_JAR."
else
    echo "Failed to download the .jar file."
    exit 1
fi
